PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04112020-05-30,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectInterim Order Respecting Clinical Trials for Medical Devices and Drugs Relating to COVID-19
PrecisOrder approving the INTERIM ORDER RESPECTING CLINICAL TRIALS FOR MEDICAL DEVICES AND DRUGS RELATING TO COVID-19, made by the Minister of Health on May 23, 2020 in order to protect the health and safety of Canadians in relation to COVID-19 by enabling a framework that introduces efficiencies in the conduct of and access to Canadian clinical trials for drugs and medical devices used in the diagnosis, treatment, mitigation, or prevention of COVID-19 or COVID-19 complications.
AttachmentsAttachment
